Reviews.Title: Best Flip-Screen Point-And-Shoot In Its Class
Reviews.Author: Holly
Reviews.Content: I am a mother of two young children, and my husband does not take pictures.  Therefore, my primary method of documenting my presence in their young lives is to take self portraits, and for that reason, I have always considered a flip/swivel screen to be a mandatory feature on all my digital cameras.  Unfortunately, this seems to be a bit of a niche feature, largely phased out of point-and-shoot cameras.  Many of the bulky SLR cameras have a flip/swivel screen, but unless you're setting it up on a tripod, you can forget about one-handed self-portraits.  Even most of the "point and shoot" varieties are still too bulky to fit comfortably in a pocket.  But Samsung seems to have finally hit my sweet spot with this small, sleek, fully-featured, highly capable, flip-screen camera.  Here are some of the features that stand out:Controls:  Very clean and simple.  You can see from the pictures that there aren't many buttons.  That is because most of the features are accessed from the touch screen.  The touch screen is very responsive to touches and swipes, comparable in my experience to iPhone touch screens.  However, as with other touch screens, you will not be able to operate the touch screen while wearing gloves, so if you plan on taking lots of outdoor photos in the winter, you might want to invest in some gloves with conductive fingertips, or make your own using metallic thread (I saw a DIY article on it somewhere).  The main menu has no less than five screens of options, including various photo and video shooting modes, scene selections, novelty modes, etc, but Samsung thoughtfully made this customizable so that you can put the options you use most on the first screen.  While you're in shooting/viewfinder/review mode, icons for any available options will pop up with a simple touch of the screen, but are otherwise hidden for a clean, uncluttered screen.Flip Screen: LOVE it.  Although the screen only flips upward 180 degrees (it is not fully articulating like some of the other flip-screen cameras I've had), the camera itself is small and handy enough to rotate the body of it to achieve any viewing angle you want.  I am a short woman and like to be able to take pictures above the heads of people in a crowd.  By holding the camera upside down and angling the screen down towards me, I have an excellent high view and can still easily press the shutter button with my left thumb.  Even better, the camera has an internal accelerometer that senses its position, and automatically rotates pictures taken from an upside-down position.  And the fact that the flip screen is also a touch screen means that the menu is handy even when the camera is pointed toward you, making it easy to set your options for your self-portrait.Picture/Video Quality: I'm only an amateur photographer, but I am very happy with the picture quality.  The light balance and color are great, and the focus is sharp.  I have read on professional reviews that indoor pictures without flash tend to be a bit "noisy", but I never noticed this until I read about it.  I think the light balance is just fine indoors, but you will want to use the fill-in flash for best color and quality.  I love the 5X optical zoom.  The camera focuses well and is nicely stabilized even when zoomed out fully, and with the 16.1 MP resolution, you can capture great detail even far away.  The video quality is terrific and outputs nicely even to our 50-inch HDTV.  And with a recording resolution of 1280 x 720, you can even get display-quality still photos (1MP) from individual video frames.Panoramic Photos: Easily the best panoramic mode I've had on a camera.  Rather than stitching together overlapping still photos, it allows you to pan from one side to another for a seamless panoramic photo, capturing up to 180 degrees of vista, although you will get a bit of a "bubble" effect when capturing such a large panorama.  It can also take vertical panoramas.3D picture capability:  I was underwhelmed with this.  The fact is, in order to see your 3D photo, you need to output to a 3D TV.  We have a Samsung 7000-series plasma TV, which itself has the ability to up-convert 2D content into 3D.  In comparing a 3D photo taken with the MV800 and a 2D photo taken the MV800 and rendered as a 3D picture on our TV, I could see no appreciable difference.  I suspect that the camera and the TV use the same technique for calculating depth in a 2D field.  Of course, I did not buy this camera for that feature, so this didn't put me out at all.On-the-fly photo/video switching: With young kids, you never know whether the next moment will be best captured with a still photo or a video.  For that reason, I've always resented cameras that make you flip a switch in order to switch between still photo and video mode, which would frequently result in me accidentally taking a video when I wanted a photo, or vice verse.  My favorite cameras have had a dedicated "record" button separate from the shutter button, but this seems to be a somewhat rare feature as well.  Samsung partially addresses this by adding a touch-screen "record" button to the "Smart Auto" camera mode.  That is, in "Smart Auto" camera mode, I can take a photo by pressing the shutter button, or take a video by touching the "record" button on the touch screen.  Otherwise, to switch between photo and video modes, you have to access the main menu.Battery life: I haven't really gotten a feel yet for how well the battery holds up.  One review I read said it only takes 100 to 120 shots on a charge, but it seems like I've been able to take more than this on a full charge, depending on how often I use the flash, and importantly, how much time I spend fiddling with the menus in between shots (the LCD uses battery power too).  When I've been disappointed with the battery, it's usually because I didn't charge it fully before using it, or I've been taking a lot of flash photographs.  I will say that the battery life indicator, which has three bars, seems to go from full to nothing very quickly.  I've heard from other owners of Samsung cameras that this is a common problem.  My guess is that each bar represents approximately 33.3% charge, so three bars could indicate as little as a 67% charge.  My advice is not to rely on the indicator as to whether your battery is fully charged or not.  The best way to know if it is fully charged is to charge it fully right before using.  It's also not a bad idea to have a charged backup battery on hand for those long events.  You can get compatible batteries for as little as $15, they are well worth the investment.In summary, I believe this is a sweet, intelligent little camera that is just crammed features.  It's almost as if Samsung had consulted me personally in designing this thing, they have paid such close attention to the details that are most important to me.  I think it would be hard to find a camera with a better balance of size, picture quality, and features.

Reviews.Title: Great shoot and point by Samsung but...
Reviews.Author: ecrz1992
Reviews.Content: I like this camera a lot! It's very stylish and I love how the LCD screen flips to take self pictures. It is built pretty sturdy so I wouldn't worry about it breaking at all...just be careful not to drop it of course. It has great HD quality videos and it looks better than what I expected. Picture quality is great and clear but since it has 5x zoom you really can't take pictures of objects that are pretty far, but that's not a big deal. The only reason I don't give it 5 stars is because this camera is not the best when it comes to indoor low light areas. I set it to Smart Auto picture mode and that didn't help to make pictures look too clear. Maybe by playing with the other settings I might find out how to take low light pictures and I might just try that. But since I really don't take pictures indoors, it's really not a big concern for me.Bottom Line: If you like to take outdoor pictures, want to have a good HD quality video, and like to take pictures of yourself and/or with another person then go ahead and get this camera!

Reviews.Title: love it
Reviews.Author: mamie
Reviews.Content: 3d pics and panaroma features are awesome. pics are superb! i like the flip out part too, u never cut ur own head off!

Reviews.Title: Love my camera
Reviews.Author: Mrs Latti
Reviews.Content: I love my camera it takes very sharp  pictures. I have not used all the different features yet. I've decided to use a different feature once a week.  I've stopped using my phone camera, cause this is so much better. Plus when I'm on vacation I don't like to be bother with phone calls.  Now when on vacation I lock my phone up in my hotel room and enjoy my new camera.

Reviews.Title: No auto-focus in low light
Reviews.Author: Jean-Philippe
Reviews.Content: The camera has excellent results in natural bright light. The self-portrait, panorama, and zoom effects are awesome.The performance in low light is another story, very disappointing. I miss many good opportunities during parties because the auto-focus is simply non-existent evenings. Samsung Multiview MV800 16.1MP Digital Camera with 5x Optical Zoom (Black)

Reviews.Title: Love my red camera
Reviews.Author: Edwards
Reviews.Content: I have a professional and 5 other brand hand held cameras. This Samsung Multiview is by far the best, it is fun to use and the price is right. The quality is great, the features are fun and menu easy to use. I would buy this camera for my niece, perfect for teens and myself (a young girl at heart) Not for professional photos but it does take great portraits. "Beauty Shot" feature is my favorite, perfect for smoothing out blemishes and wrinkles.

Reviews.Title: Poor picture quality
Reviews.Author: chandana
Reviews.Content: We wanted a compact camera for point and shoot purpose which we could take to parties and gatherings (Mainly for indoors). Pictures taken in day light are tolerable i suppose. But the ones taken at night were horrible. Plus point is that it has a lot of filters. But You can edit you pics in any photo editors that are available for free these days! We returned it as our old cannon (point and shoot)gives better results than this one.

Reviews.Title: Samsung MV 800 Digital Camera
Reviews.Author: AZFred64
Reviews.Content: I purchased this camera as a gift for my wife. She absolutely loves it. One of the more impressive things about the camera is the quality of pictures it takes. Clear, sharp images. I ordered and received the camera quickly. I was surprised to learn it did not include an SD (micro) card. I guess that's why it was less expensive than the other listings. Oh well, my fault. I bought a 32 GB card and my wife is taking pictures of everything that moves.  Very nice camera.

Reviews.Title: It's okay
Reviews.Author: Lauren "L"
Reviews.Content: What I wanted this for was a point in shoot that took decent quality photos for my everyday shooting; the baby, things around the house.I'm still not sure about this camera though and if it will stand up to my needs.. as basic as they are.First of all, the flash is either off or "auto". So far I haven't seen anything that indicates that I can force the camera to take a picture with a flash. So, trying to take pictures of my new kitchen and my new hanging lights, if those lights are on the camera will automatically turn the flash off and you just get a picture of something glowing.The features of this camera are pretty neat. You can edit your pictures and take pictures with different effect automatically and taking 2D and 3D panoramic photos is convenient. The fact that the screen adjusts to any angle is pretty neat too.Another down side is the zoom. This wouldn't even be a good camera for taking to the zoo. The camera on my phone would work just as well.If I hadn't bought this on amazon for $80 less than in stores, this would be returned.Personally, I think I  should have stuck with Nikon.

Reviews.Title: Samsung MV800
Reviews.Author: E Rodriguez "Beat"
Reviews.Content: buen producto, compacto y simple de usarllego por el servicio postal, tardo 30 dias en llegar, en buenas condicionesen general bastante bien

Reviews.Title: This camera was everything and more
Reviews.Author: Randi Nicole
Reviews.Content: I got this camera cause I have been in search of an affordable camera that had a flip out screen. I make youtube videos and I must say I am  impressed my viewers can see my products and videos a lot better and it really does the job as far as me being able to make videos and see exactly what I am doing. I like the pictures as well as far as I am concerened they are of good quality. Another thing that I enjoy about the camera is thyou can pause is that when I am filming I can pause instead of having to stop and make a new video.

Reviews.Title: unhappy with firewall llc.
Reviews.Author: b. lance
Reviews.Content: I recieved my camera and it does not work. The battery doesnt take a charge and when I press the power button it tells me that there is no battery inserted! I am a tech geek and have experience with similar cameras. this is very unusual. but dont expect any help if you purchase from firewall llc. There is no way to personally contact them. the best you can get is a refund from amazon.

Reviews.Title: Best pocket camera
Reviews.Author: B. Smith
Reviews.Content: I was looking for a small camera with a flip screen for low level photography of children and cats. I've had this camera for several months now and people ask where can they get one like this. What I like about this camera is you can hold it steady like a waist level viewfinder as on a twin lens reflex. I idea of holding a camera out at arms length just rubs me the wrong way. It takes excellent  close-up shots. Also it takes MP4 movies so I can edit on my PC without buying the extra software.  Remember to keep an eye on the battery level for at first it didn't seem to last to long, but now it seems to last a long time. Low light ability is very good, it doesn't flash when I think it should but the pictures come out excellent. Some times I put it on fill-flash if I feel the situation demands it, because it doesn't have a flash always on button. The touch screen is great, so you have a minimum of external buttons to fuss with, just leave it on smart auto and you can't go wrong.Great pictures without the bulk of a super zoom. From my experience wide angle lens is more important than super telephoto ( which seems like a marketing gimmick anyway). So a 5x zoom is more than enough, and to take great pictures you need to take your camera with you. And with this camera, you definitely want to take it with you.

Reviews.Title: DO NOT BUY!!!
Reviews.Author: BAM
Reviews.Content: This camera SUCKS!!!  It boasts similar quality to same class nikon and canon models but NOT EVEN CLOSE!!!  The reaction speed is the SLOWEST I have ever seen on a camera.  I have missed countless shots of my kids at their cutest because of this piece of trash.  Everytime I pick it up Im upset with it.  Looking for a decent river to toss it in.

Reviews.Title: You must have it
Reviews.Author: Felipe Andres Mejia Cardona
Reviews.Content: Excellent camera at a very low price for it's specifications, for those that take pictures in important events, very easy to carry

Reviews.Title: Great camera, completely satisfied !
Reviews.Author: Richard H Kelly
Reviews.Content: I really love the little screen - its perfect for me.  The unit will sit a tripod and everyone at work has been using it with a mini-pod to take self portraits for the company collaboration site.  One weekend I took it to the river for some Winter water photography to see if it makes as good an outdoor shot under stressful weather - worked like a charm even after several hours in sub-freezing morning walkabout.  Battery life is great too.

Reviews.Title: Amazing
Reviews.Author: Jose luis
Reviews.Content: Easy to use, cheap and smart. Very convenient purchase. But don't have wifi. That's all. I recommend to buy it

Reviews.Title: Perfect Conditons, lack of Full description
Reviews.Author: Yenniffer Rojas
Reviews.Content: The camera was in perfect conditions: absolutely new, it match with the established aspects in the web page description, but in my opinion, it could have given more details about the functions.

Reviews.Title: love it!
Reviews.Author: Tina Hernandez
Reviews.Content: I love the quality and much better then my last camera. I like the screen that you can flip up.

Reviews.Title: camara
Reviews.Author: Berto
Reviews.Content: Es exelente camara muy funcional y multiples funciones dependiendo de la ocacion y hasta con aplicaciones divertidas para personalizar tus fotos. exelente resolucion de imagen con panel tactil, tiene funcion de vista panoramica muy util en ambientes grandes y practica para tomarse fotos uno mismo. me encanta esta camara

Reviews.Title: i love it
Reviews.Author: DianeAudrey
Reviews.Content: i love this camera , you should all get one .. its a great birthday present , i make all my youtube videos on here and it takes great pictures  :)

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: J.J
Reviews.Content: well the camera got to me a day early and I am very pleased with the options it has and the quality of the pictures THIS THING IS GREAT u can see wrinkles on peoples faces they didnt even know they had

Reviews.Title: Self shots are great!
Reviews.Author: LoveLife
Reviews.Content: I bought this to take some self portraits and shots of me and my SO.  It is a great little camera, the pictures turn out beautifully and I am 110% satisfied.  You get used to navigating through the menu to change the photo settings.  I'm glad I purchased this camera.  BTW it is cheaper on ebay.  I should have checked ebay first.

Reviews.Title: Best
Reviews.Author: RDS
Reviews.Content: While I thought it was a little shady that it came with no memory card, which I ended up having to buy extra, I figured that was my fault for not reading the fine print better. But all I can say is wow what a dream to use and what fantastic picture quality.

Reviews.Title: Fine I suppose.
Reviews.Author: Eli Basas
Reviews.Content: This camera is just 'ok'.  Not the greatest pictures as the quality or resolution is a bit grainy.  Video isn't so great either,  very grainy output.  But for simple basic stuff, it's adequate.  Love the flip screen though so that makes up for a lot of its downfalls. (Yes, the lens is clean.)

Reviews.Title: I love this camera.
Reviews.Author: Raven fuqua
Reviews.Content: My husband got me this for my birthday and I love it! it is very awesome. The back of it flips up and you can see yourself taking a picture. It is the most awesome camera I have ever owned.

Reviews.Title: Samsung Multiview MV800
Reviews.Author: R
Reviews.Content: Best camera ever, i like it, very fast and small, I purchased this camera as a gift for my brother, perfect for him

Reviews.Title: So awesome and versatile! Worth every penny!
Reviews.Author: Amber Bailey Bell
Reviews.Content: So awesome and versatile! Takes great, high color photographs. Charges with my phone charger in the car and at home....LOVE THIS THING! The Magic Frame feature lets you superimpose faces of friends onto other things like magazine covers and the moon over an ocean! I use this more than my bulky Nikon to document my child's every step. That's the truth. Also, the flip top feature makes for much much easier photos of yourself, and the pose guise feature helps those of us who aren't so great and striking the appropriate poses...lol

Reviews.Title: good purchase
Reviews.Author: Dimitri Fevry Elisma
Reviews.Content: Very good deal and it's a very amazing camera. I bought it for a friend. Now, I just wanna one for me...

Reviews.Title: SAMSUNG MV800CAMERA
Reviews.Author: William P Gavin
Reviews.Content: I HAVE HAD THIS GREAT LITTLE CAMERA FOR QUITE SOME TIME AND IT HAS NEVER FAILED TO GIVE ME EXCELLENT RESULTS, I WOULD DEFINITLEY RECOMMEND IT TO  ANY SHUTTER BUG.

Reviews.Title: STILL GOING STRONG!!
Reviews.Author: W. Aguirre "WENDY"
Reviews.Content: THIS IS A REALLY NICE CAMERA, AND WITH ALL OF THE OPTIONS IT HAS, AS WELL AS THE SIZE, IM HAPPY WITH MY PURCHASE. I USE THE CAMERA MAINLY FOR SELLING ITEMS ON EBAY, AND ITS REALLY EASY TO CONNECT AND USE. I ALSO LIKE THE TOUCH SCREEN--NOT TOO SENSITIVE, YET NOT TOO HARD TO PRESS AND GET THE MENU YOU WANT.

Reviews.Title: Gift for my wife
Reviews.Author: E. Lauber "Serious about the book"
Reviews.Content: My wife's first digital camera had a swivel screen and she loved it. But it gave up the ghost after a few years. This was the only compact model I found at a reasonable price that has a tilt screen. It does not swivel, but the tilt is enough. What she really likes is:1. Being able to see the screen through the "close-up" part of her glasses without tilting her head back2. Getting photos at a lower angle than the usual "hold the camera at eye level" approach.

Reviews.Title: Amazing price for an awsm camera!
Reviews.Author: The Dark Lion "-K"
Reviews.Content: There's nothing more I can say about this camera than what others haven't already said, but one thing is for sure my girlfriend loved it when we were checking it out at a local electronics store the other day.  I'm so damn thankful I checked Amazon to see if they carried it, and boy did I make my wallet and my girlfriend happy!  Thanks, Dollar-Rite, for having this camera at such an awsm price!  Can't wait to go to Vegas with this in hand!  Hopefully it gets to me on time before my trip which I'm sure it would, and I'll be back in about a week to update this review with our experience with it.This is for you, hunnie~!!!  :)

Reviews.Title: Nice Camera
Reviews.Author: Ahmad S. Alquraish "Ahmad quraish"
Reviews.Content: Small camera but has many features. nice for traveling and camping. strong one, it falled down and I thout that it is breaked. but it is still working propably

Reviews.Title: EXCELLENT CAMERA
Reviews.Author: Daniel
Reviews.Content: I AM VERY HAPPY EITH THIS PRODUCT, I NEEDED A GREAT CAMERA FOR MAKING THE BEST PICTURES AND WITH THIS ONE I THINK I OBTEINED WHAT I WAS WAITING FOR, I HAVE MADE SOME PICTURES BUT I AM REALLY SATISFIED WITH THE VIDEO QUALITY, THE HIGH DEFINITION RECORDING IS EXCELLENT...

Reviews.Title: BUENO
Reviews.Author: francy
Reviews.Content: MUY BUEN VENDEDOR LA MERCANCIA LLEGO EN BUEN ESTADO GRACIAS POR SUS SERVICIOS MUY AMABLES LO RECOMIENDO AL 100 %

Reviews.Title: great
Reviews.Author: racquel
Reviews.Content: picture quality great. love it. it is light ang manageable. great buy. reccommed product. i llllove ittttt. go samsung. great

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: pau
Reviews.Content: Really good, es very easy to use it and have a lot of functions, it arrive very fast and in perfect conditions

Reviews.Title: good camera
Reviews.Author: Vera Alice Fragoso dos Santos
Reviews.Content: We had no problem with the product and even with the delivery.The machine can several resources so that flex not found very good which harms for night shots.

Reviews.Title: best camera
Reviews.Author: brandon j whitehall
Reviews.Content: The mv800 is just awesome u have to get this dont take my word for it u have to get it .

Reviews.Title: Fulfills Promises!
Reviews.Author: Debra C. Colomb "Cement"
Reviews.Content: This is an awesome little camera. The picture quality is excellent even in 10mp. Video quality is way better than my previous camera. It is beyond easy to use with minimal buttons, touch screen and automatic or custom setting that are easy to access.Battery life is so much better than my old camera that would easily open and run it's battery down doing nothing. The screen is large and though I haven't used the flip screen much it IS useful.This could not be an easier camera to use....glad I bought when I did cause the new price is higher!

Reviews.Title: I like it.
Reviews.Author: Todor Popov
Reviews.Content: Its good I like it . So far I had no problems with it. If you are considering it, just go for it .

Reviews.Title: nice camera!!!
Reviews.Author: RIC
Reviews.Content: best digital camera outhere!!! fort hat price!!!clear picture! easy to use!fun, unique style!, you will love this!samsung did it!

Reviews.Title: photo
Reviews.Author: eagle
Reviews.Content: compact with lots of options. Takes some time to learn all the options. Not that easy to take pictures with screen in up position. Quality of pictures in dark areas or people in motion, not the best.

Reviews.Title: So far so good
Reviews.Author: Carlos K.
Reviews.Content: So far im happy with this purchase. I bought this camera because i need 1 for my vacations trip and i must say, really love the flip lcd. The only con i found is the pictures taken at night are not that good.

Reviews.Title: Nice Camera
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I love this little camera. The touch screen is nice and I like to be able to rotate the viewer. The zoom works well and it takes very nice pictures.I liked it so much my wife got one for her mother for her birthday.

Reviews.Title: Love this camera!
Reviews.Author: Ro
Reviews.Content: A very neat, lightweight camera.  The flip screen allows for great self shots.  The resolution is also fantastic. The other features are good, though I haven't fiddled too much with them but the touch-up function saves some time from having to upload onto a PC using another software.  Lovely purchase!

Reviews.Title: Samsung MV800
Reviews.Author: MOGLI
Reviews.Content: This camera is more awesome than what I expected.It has so many features, crystal clear quality pictures.Its auto focus mode is awesome , many more mode  like beauty mode , close up mode add more add stars to this product.

Reviews.Title: Very hard to use, and I'm great with computers and cameras.
Reviews.Author: Stephanie Bartee
Reviews.Content: I don't know what's wrong with this thing, but every time I try to use the "Intelligent Portrait" option a message pops up that says "no face detected" or "face too close". It's really annoying because the message doesn't disappear unless you hit the OK button which seems easy, but the screen is calibrated so horribly that you have to figure out where to actually touch. I also checked, there is no option to re-calibrate the screen. With the panoramic option, it tells me every time that the direction of the picture has changed so it can't take the picture and this also pops up in a message with the phantom OK button. The 3D option is crap, it's just a zoomed in warped version of the regular pictures.  Oh and you can't take pictures too fast, even when not using the flash, you have to wait until the little red flashing symbol for the flash disappears before you can take your next picture. This camera is craptastic!

Reviews.Title: doesn't worth the money:( terrible..
Reviews.Author: christal
Reviews.Content: this item it says new but when i received it, it doesn't looks new to me. it seems like used item and this camera quality is poor it frozen all the time so i have to power off  take off the battery then put back on. .... which is suck, i am just lazy to return it by the way if i return it they will be charge me 15%  for restocking/returned  fee. so i just keep it, i hope i didn't purchase this camera so wasting money...

Reviews.Title: Love this camera but there is a glitch!
Reviews.Author: Jess
Reviews.Content: I really love this camera! It is SO USEFUL when you want to take a self picture of yourself or you and your friends. With the price, the quality of the pictures can't be beat. I am upgrading from an old Sony camera that is only 3 years old and I must say this is way BETTER. The only problem I have with this camera is even though my battery is charged, once in awhile it will say something like 'Battery is not fully inserted' Even sometimes when I just turn it on..It will SHUT OFF after that automatically. I checked everything and I don't see why it would say that. I saw only one reviewer on here that have a similar problem like mine. I am not sure if this happens to many people.Anyways, other than that simple problem - I love this camera(:

Reviews.Title: Perfect
Reviews.Author: Nanou
Reviews.Content: I got my camera within the delivery time. I am happy so far with my purchase. ANd it was 30 dollars less than everywhere else. The camera allows me to record myself take picture of what I want without asking people to take it!

Reviews.Title: Nice camera but not the best quality.
Reviews.Author: Nong Xiong
Reviews.Content: I ordered this camera and tried it out...overall I like the flipping part, but the quality isn't what I've expected. I rather get a canon camera. Thanks Samsung, you guys are good with phones, but not this, yet. :D

Reviews.Title: muy buena la camara
Reviews.Author: Edinson
Reviews.Content: hola la camara es igual a la foto y tiene todas las funciones que aparecen en la descripción la recomiendo

Reviews.Title: Awesome Phone
Reviews.Author: Zenas Zelotes
Reviews.Content: Favorite Phone Ever ...The flip screen feature is fantastic.  Saves so much time when you can get it right the first time.  No idea why this is not the industry standard.  Love it!

Reviews.Title: Lovely little camera
Reviews.Author: Harpist
Reviews.Content: Small, compact and slim... perfect size to fit in a clutch purse or back pocket for the non-professional photographer on the go. Can't wait to travel with this camera! Very happy with this purchase, and speedy shipment!

Reviews.Title: Very good camera
Reviews.Author: Duong
Reviews.Content: It is functional camera, good quality and solid built. My only complain about it is the resolution of monitor : it can not display all the details of a photo although I can only see details when viewing on the computer monitor. Overall it is good camera

Reviews.Title: AWFUL! AWFUL! AWFUL!
Reviews.Author: NikCandy
Reviews.Content: This is the worst camera I've ever owned! I hate it! I've owned 4 cameras prior to this and before purchasing this product, I did extensive research. I read dozens of product reviews and many articles on the various functions of digital cameras. This seemed like the the right camera for me. I couldn't have been more wrong! Oh where do I begin.I have a fashion blog, so I do many self portraits, so one feature that appealed to me was the multi-view. This particular camera is just AWFUL! Because of it's slim design, if it's not stationed on a very level surface, it topples over. This remains a constant problem, as sometimes I need to prop up the camera from a certain angle and it just falls right over. I've never had this problem with my last 4 cameras. It's just poorly designed.The touch screen is ultra sensitive. HATE IT!I recently came back from vacation and 80% of my photos were ruined! Forget about nighttime photos, they are ruined. I had to use my sister's iPhone to take most of my pics because this crappy camera failed time and time and time again. Despite changing the settings multiple times in multiple lights. I have changed it to every setting available, yet when the flash is activated the photos are dark and often blurry. When it's on automatic settings, the flash comes on anyway and ruins the quality. I've missed or ruined many great shots. Needless the mention the quality is not at all as crisp as I'd expected. It's just GOD AWFUL. Sure it has many cool functions, that quite frankly I don't care about. What I care for are clear, crisp photos, at night and daytime. And to be able to take decent self-portraits. What a waste of money this was. I am currently looking to buy a Nikon or Canon. This is my second Samsung camera and NEVER again will I buy another Samsung. The first one malfunctioned after less than 4 months of usage. The lens just stuck and I never dropped it or damaged it in any way, and it's not worth paying to get fixed.Just about the only good thing I can say is that the battery doesn't die quickly. Otherwise I HATE IT! Too bad it's too late to return. I am extremely disappointed!!! It's going in the garbage!

Reviews.Title: White lines on display panel
Reviews.Author: Ada
Reviews.Content: Several vertical white lines on display panel indicating spoilt pixels. The package looks really old. In workable condition and too lazy to send back for exchange.

Reviews.Title: It is a good digital camera.
Reviews.Author: Beckybei
Reviews.Content: As a digital camera, it has much higher cost-performance than Casio TRYX..It has 5X optical zoom..However, sometimes it couldn't find my face..That is a problem that makes me felt a little bit disappointed.

Reviews.Title: So far so good
Reviews.Author: Drew Pickering Jr. "DPJ"
Reviews.Content: The phone functions fine and takes good pictures.  The only thing that kinda bothered me was it didn't come with a simple case or pouch to put it in.  Screens can be damaged without something.

ProductInfo.Features:
Groundbreaking adjustable LCD screen.
Crisp, colorful images and video.
Access a host of creativity features on the brilliant 3" LCD touch screen display.
ProductInfo.Name: Samsung Multiview MV800 16.1MP Digital Camera with 5x Optical Zoom (Red)
